name: Zombies Ate My Homework
description:
Hold left mouse button and drag your mouse to aim. Release to send an item flying at a zombie (or three).

Global Game Jam 2021 - Slingshot items from a Lost-and-found drawer to defeat endless waves of zombies!

------

“Okay, Mrs. Jones is never going to believe this…”

You’re walking to school when, suddenly, a zombie appears and EATS your homework (and, well, most of your bag, too, but that’s not important). When you try to explain what happened, you’re met with detention instead.

While sitting there, people start screaming outside and your teacher rushes out. Moments later, a horde of zombies pile in and all you have is a slingshot and a drawer full of LOST-AND-FOUND items to shoot at them. Good thing you’ve been practicing your aim.

Hold left mouse button and drag your mouse to aim.

Release to send an item flying at a zombie (or three).
